page.title: 18The Veterinary Surgeon -1
page.content:
{Mr. John Broughton}lives at{Shobley} and is well known nationwide for his expertise with horses.
Q. What do you like about your job? A.{I enjoy my animals and travelling { to different places to visit them.} Q. Do you think New Forest ponies should be kept in or left to roam? A.{They have to be left out to roam, { it's their way of life. They just { rely on the forest growth.} Q. What do you do when a new born foal is abandoned or the mother dies? A.{You can rear the foal and feed it { on cow's milk supplemented, this { would cost a lot of money so would { be a labour of love and need a { great deal of hard work.} { }
